Record.ClassificationPath: Hemic and Lymphatic Diseases/Hematologic Diseases/Leukocyte Disorders/Phagocyte Bactericidal Dysfunction/Job's Syndrome
Record.Description: A disorder of neutrophils characterized by the presence of abnormal or absent chemotactic responses and hyperimmunoglobulinemia E. It is transmitted as an autosomal recessive trait and most cases reported have been in girls.
